comment._content: Evelyn Marshall Field, first wife of Marshall Field III: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marshall_Field_III

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: An account of their wedding in New York on 2/6/15. They met aboard the Lusitania. He was 21 at the time of his wedding and was already one of the richest men in the world. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9400EEDF123FE233A...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks artolog and pennylrichardsca: This does appear to be Evelyn Marshall Field, whose husband was Marshall Field III. We will add more information about her when we update the description.
